MatchedTranspiler.Name: AirtableToXml
MatchedTranspiler.Description: Extracts the contents of an airtable base as a single Xml file.

ProjectTranspilers.Name: OdxmlToCSharpPOCOs
ProjectTranspilers.CommandLine: odxml42/odxml-to-csharp-pocos -i ../../../ODXML/DataSchema.odxml -p make-fks-collections=true -p base-namespace=SassyApiHostedCore.Lib -p serialize-to-original-names=true -p list-suffix=Expanded -p include-load-methods=false -p init-lists=false -p airtable=true -p include-collections=false

MatchedTranspiler.Name: CsvToXml
MatchedTranspiler.Description: Converts a CSV File into an XML File where the names of the elemnts are derived from the column names

MatchedTranspiler.Name: XmlToPlossumCmdLineOptions
MatchedTranspiler.Description: Xml To Plossum Cmd Line Options

ProjectTranspilers.Name: XmlToPlossumCmdLineOptions
ProjectTranspilers.CommandLine:
XmlToPlossumCmdLineOptions -i ../../SSoT/CommandLineArgs.csv.xml -p handlerName=EAPICLIHandlerBase -p copyright=Copyright\ 2023,\ EJ\ Alexandra -p description=

SYNTAX:\ aicapture\ {command}\ [...{additional_args}]\ [options]
 -p application=ej-syntax-locked-vs-syntax-free\ Command\ Line\ Interface

MatchedTranspiler.Name: OdxmlToDotNetAirtableAPIWrapper
MatchedTranspiler.Description: Odxml To DotNet Airtable API Wrapper
